text: Hellohello. Are there any implementations of distributions with the reparameterization trick built-in? E.g. in PyTorch you can do `Normal(foo).rsample()`, and backpropagate through this. I presumed that Flux and Turing might play nicely together in this regard, but I couldn't find any examples of this. Thanks for any help!
